name: Spinning Circles
description: Circles are spinning in an empty room, similar to planets or moons in an orbit
background: Every object has a different size, speed and movement path that seems similar, but always diverges.

name: Spinning Cones
description: Afterimages of circles create tubes that intertwine from time to time
background: Every object has a different size, speed and movement path that seems similar, but always diverges.

name: Colourful Wave
description: A rounded rectangle spins from left to right, creating a wave effect through after images
background: Continuous rectangles spinning clockwise and then counter-clockwise, creating a rippling wave effect in the inside that is intensified by the changing colours.

name: Colourful wavy Rectangle
description: A rectangle spins from left to right with a rectengular hole in the middle, creating a wave effect through after images. It also gives the image of twisted fabric.
background: Continuous rectangles spinning clockwise and then counter-clockwise, creating a rippling wave effect in the inside that is intensified by the changing colours.

name: Colourful Flow Field
description: Click to generate a new flow field. Press P to save the flow field as a png.
background: Colours and Shape are randomized, showing more or less detail depending on the iteration.

background: Colours and Shape are randomized, showing more or less detail depending on the iteration.

name: Warped Tone
description: Draw and create cyclic shapes matching the tones played
background: A MonoSynth has been combined with PingPong Delay and a sequence of tones to create a warped sound and draw effect that reminds me of synthwave music and space.

name: Accort
background: A low accord is played while pressing the mouse with a pingpong effect over it
